text: "Werewolves of London" is a 1978 song by American singer-songwriter Warren Zevon and taken from his third studio album Excitable Boy. It went to number 8 in Australia, number 11 in New Zealand, number 18 in Canada and number 21 in the United States. Category:1978 songs Category:Warren Zevon songs
title: Werewolves of London
